00039 {
00040     
00041 }

00043 GpsInfoType* gpsGetInfo(void)
00044 {
00045     return &GpsInfo;
00046 }
00047 
00048 void gpsInfoPrint(void)
00049 {
00050 
00051     rprintfProgStrM("TOW:      ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.TimeOfWeek.f);          rprintfCRLF();
00052     rprintfProgStrM("WkNum:    ");  rprintfNum(10,4,0,' ',GpsInfo.WeekNum);         rprintfCRLF();
00053     rprintfProgStrM("UTCoffset:");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.UtcOffset.f);           rprintfCRLF();
00054     rprintfProgStrM("Num SVs:  ");  rprintfNum(10,4,0,' ',GpsInfo.numSVs);          rprintfCRLF();
00055 
00056     rprintfProgStrM("X_ECEF:   ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.PosECEF.x.f);           rprintfCRLF();
00057     rprintfProgStrM("Y_ECEF:   ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.PosECEF.y.f);           rprintfCRLF();
00058     rprintfProgStrM("Z_ECEF:   ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.PosECEF.z.f);           rprintfCRLF();
00059     rprintfProgStrM("TOF:      ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.PosECEF.TimeOfFix.f);   rprintfCRLF();
00060     rprintfProgStrM("Updates:  ");  rprintfNum(10,6,0,' ',GpsInfo.PosECEF.updates); rprintfCRLF();
00061 
00062     //u08 str[20];
00063     //rprintfProgStrM(" PosLat: ");     rprintfStr(dtostrf(GpsInfo.PosLat.f, 10, 5, str));
00064     rprintfProgStrM("PosLat:   ");  rprintfFloat(8, 180*(GpsInfo.PosLLA.lat.f/PI)); rprintfCRLF();
00065     rprintfProgStrM("PosLon:   ");  rprintfFloat(8, 180*(GpsInfo.PosLLA.lon.f/PI)); rprintfCRLF();
00066     rprintfProgStrM("PosAlt:   ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.PosLLA.alt.f);          rprintfCRLF();
00067     rprintfProgStrM("TOF:      ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.PosLLA.TimeOfFix.f);    rprintfCRLF();
00068     rprintfProgStrM("Updates:  ");  rprintfNum(10,6,0,' ',GpsInfo.PosLLA.updates);  rprintfCRLF();
00069 
00070     rprintfProgStrM("Vel East: ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.VelENU.east.f);         rprintfCRLF();
00071     rprintfProgStrM("Vel North:");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.VelENU.north.f);        rprintfCRLF();
00072     rprintfProgStrM("Vel Up:   ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.VelENU.up.f);           rprintfCRLF();
00073 //  rprintfProgStrM("TOF:      ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.VelENU.TimeOfFix.f);    rprintfCRLF();
00074     rprintfProgStrM("Updates:  ");  rprintfNum(10,6,0,' ',GpsInfo.VelENU.updates);  rprintfCRLF();
00075 
00076     rprintfProgStrM("Vel Head: ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.VelHS.heading.f);       rprintfCRLF();
00077     rprintfProgStrM("Vel Speed:");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.VelHS.speed.f);         rprintfCRLF();
00078 //  rprintfProgStrM("TOF:      ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.VelHS.TimeOfFix.f); rprintfCRLF();
00079     rprintfProgStrM("Updates:  ");  rprintfNum(10,6,0,' ',GpsInfo.VelHS.updates);   rprintfCRLF();
00080 
00081 }
